Name: Fobia
About the game: A little girl tries to escape from her fears overcoming various obstacles in her path. Fobia is a short puzzle-platformer adventure game developed by two people, where you will have an adventure in a mysterious world full of dangerous situations, enemies and challenging puzzles. Features: A beautiful world where a misstep means death. Unique and peculiar hand drawn 2D Art-Style and 2D animation. A big variety of puzzles designed with different levels of difficulty. Atmospheric sound design. Two different endings.
